To identify which Conditional Access policies will apply to a user when they sign into the Microsoft Office 365 portal from a Windows 10 computer, you should use the What If tool. The What If tool is available in the Azure Active Directory admin center and allows you to simulate Conditional Access policies for specific users, devices, and applications to understand the impact of those policies on the user's sign-in experience.
